Question Composition

easy 🌶️2

Parse errors

Which program does not causes any parse errors?

Choose one correct answer:

print "banana"

print "🍌

print "print 🍌"

print "print banana"

Note: A parse error is an error that occurs while parsing the program. It is also called syntax error or compilation error.

Parse errors

Note: A parse error is an error that occurs while parsing the program. It is also called syntax error or compilation error.
